conversations.content: How many appointments do I have today?

<function_thought>
To determine how many appointments the user has today, I will first need to ascertain the current date by invoking the `get_current_day` function. After obtaining the date, I can then use the `get_day_calendar_events` function to retrieve the appointments for that date. This will allow me to count the number of appointments.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The current date has been retrieved as May 15, 2024. Next, I'll call the `get_day_calendar_events` function to fetch the appointments for today.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
